docs.title: Wichtige Hinweise
docs.text: Diese Dokumentation umfasst Entscheidungen bzgl. unserer Arbeitsweise sowie viele Best-Practice

docs.title: Links
docs.text:
• MeKoRP (prod): https://rp.meko.work
  • MeKoRP (staging): https://rp-dev.meko.dev

docs.title: Headings
docs.text: You can set headings (h1 - h6)

docs.title: Typographic replacements
docs.text:
Enable typographer option to see result.

(c) = ©

(r) = ®

(tm) = ™

+/- = ±

1/2 = ½

--> = → sowie <-- = ←

docs.title: Emphasis
docs.text:
This is bold text

This is bold text as well

This is italic text

This is italic text too

Strikethrough text

docs.title: Blockquotes
docs.text:
Blockquotes can also be nested...

...by using additional greater-than signs right next to each other...

...or with spaces between arrows.

docs.title: Lists
docs.text:
Unordered List

  • Create a list by starting a line with +, -, or *
  • Sub-lists are made by indenting 2 spaces:
  • Marker character change forces new list start:
    • Ac tristique libero volutpat at
    • Facilisis in pretium nisl aliquet
    • Nulla volutpat aliquam velit
  • Very easy!

Ordered List

  1. Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet
  2. Consectetur adipiscing elit
  3. Integer molestie lorem at massa

docs.title: Code
docs.text:
Inline code

Indented code:

// Some comments
line 1 of code
line 2 of code
line 3 of code

Block code with "fences":

Sample code here...

Syntax highlighting is possible:

var foo = function (bar) {
  return bar++;
};

console.log(foo(5));

docs.title: Tables
docs.text:
Option Description data path to data files to supply the data that will be passed into templates. engine engine to be used for processing templates. Handlebars is the default. ext extension to be used for dest files.

Right aligned columns

Option Description data path to data files to supply the data that will be passed into templates. engine engine to be used for processing templates. Handlebars is the default. ext extension to be used for dest files.

docs.title: Images
docs.text:
Like links, Images also have a footnote style syntax

With a reference later in the document defining the URL location:

docs.title: Collapsable blocks
docs.text:
Possible types of collapsable blocks: note, abstract, info, tip, success, question, warning, danger, bug, example, quote

Info

This text is hidden until it's revealed.

Warning

This note is hidden until it's revealed.

docs.title: Footnotes
docs.text: Footnotes1 have a label2 and the footnote's content.

docs.title: MathExpressions
docs.text:
You can use LaTeX math expressions:

\[ f(x) = x^2 \]

  1. This is a footnote content. ↩

  2. A footnote on the label: "@#$%". ↩
